item.title: HSBC’s return-to-office push risks denting CEO’s savings plan
item.description: The extra real estate costs could hinder the bank in its bid to find $1.5 billion in annual cost savings.

item.title: The Strait of Hormuz is a critical chokepoint for global energy markets, but there are ways to get around it
item.description: About 20 million barrels of oil a day flow through the Strait of Hormuz, or the equivalent of 20% of global petroleum liquids consumption.

item.title: Iran launches missile attack on U.S. base in Qatar as Tehran responds to attack on nuclear sites
item.description: Iran announced on state television that it attacked American forces stationed at Qatar’s Al Udeid Air Base.

item.title: Anthony Pompliano strikes deal to create publicly-traded Bitcoin treasury company
item.description: The company will spend up to $1 billion to establish a Bitcoin treasury.

item.title: Trump demands ‘everyone’ keep oil prices down after Iran threatens to close Strait of Hormuz following U.S. attack: ‘I’m watching’
item.description: Trump urged stepped-up production as the White House sharpened its warnings to Iran against closing the Strait of Hormuz.
